title: cmd/ld: internal link error 'unexpected GOT reloc' on debian sid/i386
body:
by **elbingmiss**: 
Building Go from sources with last three kernels/libc6 of Debian Testing (since go 1.3
was announced):

Debian 3.14.12-1 (2014-07-11) i686 GNU/Linux
libc: glibc 2.19-7

# ../misc/cgo/test
scatter = 0x804c6a0
hello from C
sqrt is: 0
PASS
ok  	_/home/elbing/lib/go/misc/cgo/test	1.793s
# testmain
_/home/elbing/lib/go/misc/cgo/test(.text): unexpected GOT reloc for non-dynamic symbol
_cgoexp_b4c3633d7731_goCallback

FAIL	_/home/elbing/lib/go/misc/cgo/test [build failed]
